byed (C D G N Q) ] phyed? (D), 'gyur (W)

zhing shes lus dang rnam bral ba
shes pa yin nam shes min nyid
gal te shes 'di shes bya yod
shes bya yod na mi grol lo BCt_12.80

rnam (G N Q) ] ma (C D)

ci ste khyod la shes min 'grub
bdag tu rtog pas ci zhig bya
bdag dang bral yang shes pa ni
rab grub shing dang rtsig pa bzhin BCt_12.81

min (W) ] mi (C D G N Q)

gang phyir gong nas gong du ni
gap: 7 syllables
gap: 7 syllables
gap: 7 syllables BCt_12.82

de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyi ni chos
mkhyen nas de ni ma tshim zhing
mtha' dag min zhes shes nas su
de nas so sor gshegs pa'o BCt_12.83

tshim (C D G Q) ] chim (N)

de nas khyad par thos 'dod pa
lhag spyod kyi ni gnas su gshegs
de yi bdag tu 'dzin las kyang
des ni lta bar sred ma gyur BCt_12.84

thos (W) ] chos (C D G Q), tshos (N)

'du shes 'du shes med pa'i skyon
thub pa lhag spyod kyis shes nas
'du shes 'du shes C, p. 50bmed bdag min
cung zad med las gzhan 'gro thob BCt_12.85

gang phyir dmigs pa phra mo na
'du shes 'du shes med las gzhan
'du shes med min 'du shes min
de phyir der ni re G, p. 64b'dod med BCt_12.86

na (W) ] ni (C D G N Q)
med (G N Q) ] min (C D)

gang phyir der ni blo gnas shing
gzhan du rab tu rgyu ba med
phra zhing rno ldan de phyir der
'du shes med min 'du shes med BCt_12.87

blo (C D) ] bla (G N Q)
der (C D G N) ] bde (Q)

de phyir de yang rab thob nas
slar yang 'gro ba 'khor ba ste
byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dod pas
de phyir lhag spyod dor ba'o BCt_12.88

lhag (C D G Q) ] ltag (N)

de nas de yi gnas thon nas
dge legs don gnyer nges byas nas
ga ya rgyal po'i drang srong N, p. 54agi
grong khyer zhes bya'i gnas bsnyen no BCt_12.89

thon (W) ] thob (C D G N Q)
ga ya (W) ] gang yang (C D G N Q)
po'i (W) ] ba'i (C D G N Q)
gi (G N Q) ] gis (C D)

de nas nai ra-nydza na'i 'gram
gtsang mar gtsang zhing pha rol gnon
dben pa'i gnas ni mngon 'dod pa'i
thub pa yis ni gnas mdzad do BCt_12.90

de nas de ni sngar brten D, p. 46azhing
dbang po lnga yi dbang las khengs
mun pas Q, p. 56absnyen pa'i brtul zhugs can
dge slong lnga rnams des gzigs so BCt_12.91

bsod nams kyis bsgrubs nor nad med
dbang don rnams kyis dbang phyug bzhin
dge slong de rnams kyis kyang 'dir
de mthong gyur nas nye bar gnas BCt_12.92

de'i dbang gis gnas slob ma rnams
dbang po g.yos pas yid bzhin du
rab tu de rnams kyis mchod cing
rnam par dul las rjes su 'jug BCt_12.93

gis (C D G Q) ] gis (N), gi (W)
rnams (C D N Q) ] rnams (G)
rjes su (C D N Q) ] rjesu (G)

'chi dang skyes pa W, skyes ba mthar byed la
de nas thabs ni 'di yis zhes
bza' ba med par de yis ni
dka' thub gdung ba rnams brtsams so BCt_12.94

skyes pa W, skyes ba (N) ] skye ba (C D G Q)
bza' (C D G N) ] gza' (Q)
de yis ni (G N Q) ] shes pa yis (C D)
brtsams so (C D N Q) ] brtsamso (G)

bsnyen gnas cho ga du ma rnams
mi yis spyod dka' rnams mdzad cing
las ni thob bzhed lo drug tu
bdag gi sku lus rid par mdzad BCt_12.95

bsnyen ] bsmyung (D), smyung (C), bsnyun (G N Q)Skt. upavāsa = bsnyung ba Mvy 7005 (ed. S.) (RS)
gi (C D Q) ] gis (G N)
rid (G) ] rid (N), ring (Q), rig (D), rig (C)

pha mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba yi
pha rol thob par 'dod pa des
bza' ba'i dus su til dang 'bru
rag sha rnams ni re re gsol BCt_12.96

dka' thub gdung ba des de yi
G, p. 65asku las bri bar byas pa gang
slar yang de yi gzi brjid kyis
sku lus nye bar 'phel byas gyur BCt_12.97

las (C D G N Q) ] lus (W)
'phel (C D G N) ] ' pel (Q)

ston ka'i dkar phyogs dang po yi
zla bas ku mu da rnams C, p. 51abzhin
rid kyang dpal grags rid min zhing
gzhan gyi mig rnams tshim par mdzad BCt_12.98

ku (C D G N) ] sku (Q)
da (G N Q) ] ta (C D)
rid (C D) ] ris (G N Q)
gyi (G N Q) ] gyis (C D)

rus lpags lhag ma lhag med par
tshil dang sha dang khrag rnams kyis
zad kyang zab mo ma zad par
rgya mtsho bzhin du de mdzes so BCt_12.99

mdzes so (C D N Q) ] mdzeso (G)

de nas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas
ngal dub gdung bas don med gsal
nyon mongs lus can thub pa ni
srid las 'jigs pa blo mdzad do BCt_12.100

gsal (W) ] bsal (C G N Q), bsal (D)
do (D G N Q) ] de (C)Das -o ist in D relativ klein geschrieben. (RS)

chos 'di chags bral phyir min zhing
rtogs phyir ma yin thar phyir min
de tshe 'dzam bu'i rtsa bar gang
bdag gis thob de nges N, p. 54bpa yin BCt_12.101

thob de (W) ] thos te (C D G N Q)
pa (C D G N Q) ] par (W)

'di ni stobs chung Q, p. 56bgis thob par
nus pa med phyir gus 'ongs shing
sku yi stobs ni 'phel don du
slar yang 'di ni rjes su bsam BCt_12.102

bsam (G N Q) ] bsams (C D)

bkres dang skom pas yongs bcer zhing
ngal las rang gnas med pa'i sems
yid kyis thob bya'i 'bras bu ni
ldog pa med pa gang gis 'thob BCt_12.103

bcer (N W) ] gtser (C D), btser (G Q)
thob (C D G Q) ] thob (Q), theb (N)
gis (G N Q) ] zhig (C D)

rtag par dbang po tshim pa las
yang dag gnas pa 'thob pa ste
dbang po yang D, p. 46bdag tshim nyid kyis
yid ni rang bzhin gnas pas thob BCt_12.104

las (C D N Q) ] las (G)
tshim (C D N Q) ] tshi (G)
kyis (C D) ] kyi (G N Q)
pas (N Q) ] pas (G), pa (C D), la? (C)
thob (N Q) ] 'thob (C D G)
yang dag gnas pa 'thobpa ste | | dbang po yang dag tshi nyid kyi | | yid ni rang bzhin gnaspas 'thob | | dang zhing rab dang yid kyi ni minute scriptum G.

rang zhing rab dang yid kyi ni
ting 'dzin nye bar skye ba ste
ting 'dzin gyis sbyar sems kyi ni
bsam gtan sbyor ba rab tu 'jug BCt_12.105

rang (W) ] dang (C D G N Q)
kyi (G Q) ] kyis (C D)
gtan (C D G Q) ] gtam (N)

bsam gtan rab tu zhugs pa las
rnyed dka' zhi zhing rga med mchog
'chi med go 'phang de chos rnams
gang gis thob pa rab thob bo BCt_12.106

dka' (D G N Q) ] dga' (C)
rga (W) ] dga' (C D G N Q)Vgl. Nāg.t IV.1b: dga' (lies *rga) bas (= Skt. jarā). (RS)
go (C G N Q) ] ge (D)
bo (G N) ] po (D Q), po (C)

de phyir bza' ba rtsa ba ste
'di ni thabs zhes nges pa yin
bza' ba byed la brtan pa ni
dpag med blo G, p. 65byis blo mdzad nas BCt_12.107

zhes (C D N Q) ] shes (G)

khrus byas nai ra-nydza 'gram nas
lag byin 'gram gyi ljon shing ni
gus pa yis dud yal ga'i rtses
sku lus rid pa ngal bus drangs BCt_12.108

lag (C D N Q) ] lags (G)
gus (C D) ] gud (G N Q)
yis (C D) ] yid (G N Q)
rid (C D G N) ] rid (Q)

de nas lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i
ba glang skyong ba bdag mo ni
snying la dga' skyes gyur pa gyur pa yi
dga' stobs ma ni der 'ongs so BCt_12.109

glang (G N Q) ] lang (C D)
ba bdag (G N Q) ] bdag bu (C D)
gyur pa (W) ] 'gyur ba (C D G N Q)
'ongs so (C D N Q) ] 'ongso (G)

dung dkar gyis 'bar lag pa can
lwa ba sngon po gon pa mo
lbu ba dang bcas chu sngon phreng
chu mchog ya mu na C, p. 51bbzhin no BCt_12.110

lwa (W) ] la (C D G N Q)
lbu (G N Q) ] dbu (C D)
phreng (C D N Q) ] 'phreng (G)

spyan mig u-tpal rab rgyas shing
dad pas 'phel ba'i dga' ma des
de la mgo yis rab btud nas
'o ma drangs par gyur pa'o BCt_12.111

des de gsol nas de la ni
skye ba'i 'bras bu thob byas nas
yang dag dbang po drug tshim ste
byang chub 'thob par nus par gyur BCt_12.112

de (C G Q) ] nge? (Q), de (D), da (N)
'thob (C D G Q) ] 'theb (N)

phul byung rgyas pa'i sku mnga' zhing
rang gi grags bcas thub pa ni
nus gyur rgya mtsho gnyis dag gi
mdzes dang brtan pa gcig pos bzung BCt_12.113

gi (G N Q) ] gis (C D)
brtan (G N Q) ] bstan (C D)
pos (G N Q) ] pus (C D)

Q, p. 57abdag ni nges par grol ba la
blo ldan khams lnga rnams kyis ltar
kun nas 'jug ces rnam shes nas
dge slong lnga rnams kyis de dor BCt_12.114

de nas 'bad rtsol gnyis pa ni
byang chub ched du nges N, p. 55amdzad de
rtswa 'jam bkram pa'i sa gzhi la
a shwa ttha yi rtsa bar gshegs BCt_12.115

rtswa (C D N Q) ] rtsa (G)
shwa ttha ] shwad tha (D), shwad tha (C), shwa-dtha (G N Q)

de tshe glang po'i gap: 4 syllables 'gros mnga' ba'i
dpe med zhabs kyi sgra yis sad par byas pa ni
thub pa chen po'i byang chub nges par rtogs pa yis
sbrul mchog nag po zhes byas stod pa smras par gyur BCt_12.116

yis (G N Q) ] yi (C D)
sbrul (W) ] grub (C D G N Q)
mchog (C D G Q) ] mcheg (N)
stod (G N Q) ] bstod (C D)

ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi zhabs kyis brdzis pa ni
yang nas yang du sa ni sgra skad sgrog pa 'dra
ji ltar khyod kyi 'od ni nyi G, p. 66altar snang ba ste
khyod kyis nges par 'dod pa'i go 'phang mkhyen pa nyid BCt_12.117

kyi (G N Q) ] kyis (C D)
sgrog (W) ] sgrogs (C D G N Q)
'od (C D G N Q) ] 'di (W)In N leicht verlesbar zu 'di, weil in der Zeile darüber (N55a1) sgra (12.115b) steht und das -o- mit dem -r- fast zusammenstößt. (RS)
ltar (G N Q) ] mar (C D)

ji ltar mkha' la khug rta'i phreng ba rnams bskor zhing
pa-dma'i D, p. 47aspyan mnga' khyed la skor ba byed pa nyid
ji ltar mkha' la rlung rnams zhi bar 'gro ba ste
khyod kyis nges par de ring sangs rgyas 'gyur ba nyid BCt_12.118

rnams (C D) ] rnam (G N Q)

de nas klu mchog gis ni yang dag bstod pa ni
lco ga las ni gtsang ma'i rtswa rnams nyer blangs nas
byang chub shing chen rtsa ba dge la rab brten cing
byang chub ched du dam bca' mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o BCt_12.119

klu (G N Q) ] glu (C D)
gtsang (C D G N Q) ] gtsang (NB), gcang (NL)
blangs (C D G Q) ] slangs (N)
rtsa ba (C D G N) ] rtsab (W)
dge (C D G N Q) ] dag (W)
brten (G N Q) ] brtan (C D)

de nas gnyid log lto 'phye'i gdengs ka bsdus pa la
des ni rdo rje'i skyil krung g.yo med mchog bcings te
ji srid bya ba byas pa nyid ni ma thob par
de srid sa la gdan de 'byed par mi bgyi'o BCt_12.120

ka (W) ] kas (C D), skad (G N Q)
la (G N Q) ] las (C D)

de nas nges pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan gdan mdzad tshe
lha na gnas rnams mnyam med dga' ba thob gyur la
ri dags tshogs rnams gnas par ma C, p. 52agyur bya rnams dang
rlung gis bsnun pa'i nags kyi ljon shing sgra med gyur BCt_12.121

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | Q, p. 57bring 'phur dang lhag spyod kyi drung du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ||

'phur (C D) ] phur (G N Q)
spyod kyi (C D G Q) ] spyod (N W)

der ni rnam par thar phyir dam bca' mdzad pa na
rgyal po'i rigs las rab 'khrungs drang srong chen po ni
der ni nye bar zhugs tshe 'jig rten rab dga' zhing
der ni bdud kyang dam pa'i chos kyi dgrar gyur to BCt_13.1

gang la 'dod pa'i lhar ni 'jig rten N, p. 55bna smra ba
sna tshogs mtshon cham tog mda' can de bzhin na du
'dod pa rab tu spyod pa'i bdag po de nyid la
thar pa'i dgra bo bdud du dpe brjod byed pa'o BCt_13.2

de yi bu ni rol pa dga' ba rgyags pa dang
bu mo dga' ma dges ma sred ma gsum rnams kyis
de la sems kyi rnam par 'gyur ba dris pa ste
des ni de rnams la tshig mngon par smras BCt_13.3

thub pa 'dis ni nges pa'i go cha rnams gzung zhing
sems dpa' mtshon cha blo yi mda' ni bsdoms byas nas
bdag cag yul rnams la ni rgyal 'dod bsdad pa ste
gang phyir 'dis ni bdag gi yid ni rnam par 'gyur BCt_13.4

gal te 'dis bdag zil gyis mnan nas 'gro ba ste
'jig pa la yang thar pa'i lam dag 'chad byed cing
lus 'phags jo bo spyod las lhung ba'i bzhin du ni
de phyir 'di yis bdag gi yul ni de ring stongs BCt_13.5

de phyir ji srid 'dis ni spyan mig ma thob cing
ji srid bdag gi spyod yul dag na gnas pa nyid
chu bo shin tu 'phel ba'i shugs kyis zam pa bzhin
de srid 'di yi brtul zhugs 'joms su 'gro ba'o BCt_13.6

de nas me tog las byas gzhu ni bzung nas dang
kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i mda' lnga rnams bzung nas
skye dgu rnams kyi gap: 2 syllables rang gnas mi byed pa
de ni bur bcas a shwa ttha yi rtsa bar song BCt_13.7

de nas srid pa 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pa'i
thub pa rab tu zhi bar gdan la bzhugs pa la
Q, p. 58alag pa g.yas pa mtshon cha'i rtse mor brdungs nas ni
mda' yis rol zhing bdud kyis 'di ni smras pa'o BCt_13.8

kye ho rgyal rigs 'chi bas 'jigs pa longs mdzod cig
thar pa'i chos ni spongs la 'jig rten mdzod
mda' dang mchod sbyin rnams kyis 'jig rten pham byas nas
'jig rten dag na dbang po'i go 'phang thob par mdzod BCt_13.9

gang zhig mi dbang snga ma rnams kyis drangs pa ste
nges par 'byung la 'di ni grags pa'i lam yin zhing
rgyal po'i drang srong rnam yangs rigs su skyes pa yi
slong mo rab thob la ni 'di ni bsngags ma yin BCt_13.10

ji srid nges pa'i bdag nyid de ring med ldan na
dam bca' rnam par ma dor brtan par gyur cig dang
gang zhig nya dgra sū rya ka la rnam spangs pa'i
de nyid bdag gis mda' 'di 'phyar bar byas pa'o BCt_13.11

'dis ni cung zhig reg pa tsam gyis e la de
zla ba'i tsha bo yin yang sems med gyur pa ste
zhi ba'i lus zhes bya ba de yang der gyur nas
zad pa'i dus su kye ma mi gzhan smos ci dgos BCt_13.12

de phyir skyen par longs la 'du shes thob gyis dang
yang yang shin tu ro myang mda' ni gnas pa ste
dga' ma'i byar 'os dga' zhing dges pa rnams la ni
gang zhig ngang pa rnams la bzhin du mi 'phen no BCt_13.13

gang tshe de skad brjod kyang chags pa dang bral ba'i
shākya thub pas gdan ni bshig pa ma yin nyid
de nas 'di la bdud kyis mda' ni 'phangs pa ste
bu mo rnams dang bu rnams mdun nas byas nas so BCt_13.14

der ni de yis mda' ni rab tu 'phangs na yang
chags par byas pa med cing brtan las g.yos pa med
de ltar de mthong gyur nas bdud ni yi mug cing
bsam mno yongs su ldan pa Q, p. 58bdal bus smras par gyur BCt_13.15

bus ] bu (Q)

ri dbang bu mo la dmigs gang gis phug pa yi
bde 'byung lha yang yongs su g.yos par gyur pa ste
'dis ni mda' de nyid la sems par mi byed pa
sems med yin nam mda' 'di de ma yin nam ci BCt_13.16

de phyir me tog mda' 'di 'os pa ma yin zhing
dga' ba ma yin gap: 2 syllables sbyor ba 'os ma yin
'di ni zhi ba ma yin 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis
'jigs dang bsdigs dang rdeg pa rnams ni 'os pa'o BCt_13.17

de nas bdud kyis rang gi sde ni dran pa ste
shākya thub pa'i bgegs ni mnyam por byed 'dod pa
ral gri be con shing rtse ljon shing rtse gsum mdun lag rnams
sna tshogs bsam pa dang ldan rjes su 'brang rnams 'ongs BCt_13.18

phag dang nya dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong can rnams
stag dang dom dang seng ge gnyis 'thung gdong can rnams
mig gcig kha ni du ma mgo bo gsum ldan rnams
gsum pa 'phyang ba rnams dang gsus pa che ba rnams BCt_13.19

brla rnams pus mo'i bar du bum pa'i pus mo rnams
mche ba'i mtshon cha rnams dang sen mo'i mtshon cha rnams
keng rus gdong can rnams dang gzugs ni mang po rnams
gdong phyed zhom pa rnams dang gdong ni chen po rnams BCt_13.20

thal skya rnams dang thig le dmar po sna tshogs rnams
kha ṭwāṃ ga rnams dang ni spre'u ltar dud skra rnams
'phreng 'phyang rnams dang glang po'i rna ba'i rna ba rnams
pags pa'i gos can rnams dang gos dang bral ba rnams BCt_13.21

gdong phyed dkar po rnams dang lus phyed ljang khu rnams
zangs mdog dud mdog rnams dang ljang gu dkar po rnams
sbrul gyi sham thabs rnams dang de bzhin lag pa rnams
rab tu sgro sgrogs dril bu 'khrugs pa'i ska rags rnams BCt_13.22

ta la'i tshad mnyam Q, p. 59arnams dang mdung rnams bzung ba rnams
byis pa'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mche ba gtsigs pa rnams
lug gi gdong can rnams dang bya yi mig can rnams
byi la'i gdong can rnams dang mi yi lus can rnams BCt_13.23

skra bkam rnams dang ral pa can dang byi bo rnams
gos dmar rnams dang rnam par 'khrugs pas dkris pa rnams
rab dga'i gdong can rnams dang gnyer ma'i gdong can rnams
gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang yid ni 'phrog pa rnams BCt_13.24

kha cig dag ni 'gro zhing drang tu phan tshun du
mchan khung 'khyud cing de bzhin gzhan rnams mchongs
mkha' la 'gro ba rnams ni kha cig rtse ba ste
kha cig shing gi rtse mo rnams la zhon pa'o BCt_13.25

kha cig rtse gsum skor zhing gar ni byed pa ste
kha cig dbyug pa gdengs shing thog sgra sgrogs pa'o
kha cig dga' bas khyu mchog bzhin du skad 'don zhing
kha cig lus 'phros rnams las rab tu 'bar bar gyur BCt_13.26

'dzin par 'dod pa rnams dang 'joms par 'dod pa rnams
jo bo'i bka' ni rab tu skyong bar byed pa ste
rnam pa de ltar 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nas ni
byang chub sems dpa' de la yongs su bskor nas gnas BCt_13.27

mtshan mo snga ma la ni shākya'i khyu mchog dang
bdud kyi 'thab mo dus de rab tu mthong nas ni
nam mkha' gsal ba ma yin sa ni g.yos gyur la
phyogs rnams sgra dang bcas pa rab tu 'bar bar gyur BCt_13.28

drag po'i shugs can rlung ni kun tu g.yos gyur la
skar ma rnams ni mi sngan zla ba gsal ma gyur
slar yang mtshan mor mun pa rnam par gyas gyur la
rgya mtsho rnams mi thams cad kun tu g.yos par gyur BCt_13.29

sa gzhi 'dzin cing chos dag 'dzin pa'i klu rnams ni
thub pa Q, p. 59bchen po'i bgegs la bzod pa ma yin zhing
bdud la khros pas rnam par log pa'i mig can rnams
rngam pa bton zhing lus ni rnam par gyur pa'o BCt_13.30

gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i lha yi drang srong ni
dam chos bsrung ba'i don du mngon par zhugs pa rnams
bdud la yid kyis rjes su brtse ba byas pa ste
chags dang bral ba las kyang khros par ma gyur to BCt_13.31

'tshe ba'i bdag nyid bdud kyi dpung ni de yis ni
byang chub rtsa ba de ni khyab pa mthong nas ni
chos kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thar pa 'dod rnams kyis
nam mkha' dag la ha ha'i sgra dag byas par gyur BCt_13.32

chos kyi cho ga de ni nye bar nyams byed pa
bdud dpung gnas pa drang srong chen pos gzigs nas ni
ba lang rnams kyi dbus su seng ge gnas pa bzhin
g.yo 'gul med cing rnam par 'gyur bar yang ma gyur BCt_13.33

de nas de yi 'jigs pa'i ched du bdud kyis ni
'byung po'i sde ni drang ba rnams la bka' stsal cing
de nas 'di yi sde des rang rang mthu rnams kyis
de yi brtan pa dbye phyir blo gros byas pa'o BCt_13.34

kha cig lce rnams g.yo zhing du mas rnam 'chang zhing
mche ba'i rtse mo rnams rno mig rnams ljang ser zlum
kha rnams gdangs shing phur bu'i rna ba rnams brtan cing
kun nas skrag par byed pa snyam du gnas zhes grags BCt_13.35

des ni gzugs dang bsam pa dag gis mi bzad pa
rnam pa de lta nyid du gnas pa de rnams las
rtsod mo byed pa'i byis pa rgyags pa rnams las ni
drang srong chen po zug med skyo bar ma gyur to BCt_13.36

de nas kha cig khros pas lta byed rnam 'gyur zhing
'di la dbyug pa brdeg par 'bad pa bya ba ste
sngon tshe grong khyer 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang bcas ltar
de nas 'di yi dbyug pa dang bcas lag pa rengs BCt_13.37

kha cig rdo dang shing rnams gyen du 'phyar ba ni
thub pa Q, p. 60ala ni rnam par 'phen par ma nus te
'bigs byed ri brag rnams ni rdo rje bcom pa bzhin
shing rnams dang bcas rdo rnams bacs pa de bzhin lhung BCt_13.38

kha cig mkha' la gyen du 'phur bas rdo rnams dang
dgra sta rnams dang shing rnams rnam par 'phangs pa rnams
kha dog gcig min mtshams sprin rkang pa rnams bzhin du
mngon par lhung ba ma yin rnam par gnas par gyur BCt_13.39

ngzan ni de yi steng du 'bar ba'i khyu mchog gi
glang po ri bo tsam pa'i rwa can 'phangs pa ste
de ni 'phangs pa tsam na nam mkhar gnas pa nyid
de yi mthu las rnam pa brgyar ni gas par gyur BCt_13.40

'jig rten 'jig tshe lhun po rab tu 'bar ba yis
gser gyi bya skyibs rnams kyi phye ma rnams bzhin du
kha cig nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'bar ba yis
me mdag char pa chen po mkha' las phab par gyur BCt_13.41

byang chub shing gi rtsa bar rab tu rnam 'phangs pa'i
me stag 'phro ba dang bcas me mdag char pa de
drang srong rnam pa mchog gi byams pa'i gnas pa las
u tpa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i char par gyur pa'o BCt_13.42

lus dang sems la rnam par gnod par bya ba'i phyir
rnam par de ltar phab pa de dang de rnams kyis
rang gi nges pa'i gnyen 'dun nye bar 'khyud nas bzhin
shākya thub pa gdan las g.yos par ma gyur to BCt_13.43

de nas gzhan rnams 'khogs pa'i ljon shing rnams nas ltar
kha rnams las ni sbrul rnams rnam par skyugs pa ste
sngags kyis bcings bzhin de rnams de yi drang du ni
song ba ma yin dbugs min g.yos par ma gyur to BCt_13.44

gzhan rnams glog dang bcas shing thog dang bcas pa yis
chu 'dzin chen po gtum pa'i dbyangs ldan rnams gyur nas
ljon shing de la rdo ba'i Q, p. 60bchar pa phab pa ste
de ni me tog char pa mdzes par gyur pa'o BCt_13.45

dbang phyug ma yin sron par dka' ba'i mi yi na
snying la yongs su g.yos pa'i khro ba bzhin du ni
de nas gzhan gyis gzhu la mda' dag bkod pa ni
de nyid du ni 'bar zhing lhung bar ma gyur to BCt_13.46

yul la rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba la 'jigs pa
yongs su rtog pa po yi dbang po lnga rnams bzhin
ngzan rnams dag gis mda' lnga rab tu 'phangs pa rnams
nam mkha' gnas shing thub pa la ni ma lhung ngo BCt_13.47

gzhan ni brdeg par 'dod pas khros shing rab bskor zhing
dbyug pa bzung nas drang srong chen po'i mngon du phyogs
don med byed pa'i nyes pa rnams la 'jig rten bzhin
des ni 'dod pa ma thob dbang med 'gyel bar gyur BCt_13.48

bud med sprin pa nag po lag na thod pa can
drang srong chen po'i thugs ni rmongs par byed ces grags
g.yoba'i bdag nyid can gyi blo ni lung la bzhin
der ni nges par med par skor zhing gnas ma yin BCt_13.49

kha cig mig ni rab tu 'bar bar byas nas ni
mig gi me yis sbrul gyi dug bzhin bsreg 'dod pas
'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyer gnas dpal bzhin du
der ni drang srong bzhugs pa mthong bar ma gyur to BCt_13.50

ye shes ting 'dzin dag gis 'gro bya nye legs chos
lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis 'thob par 'dod pa bzhin
de bzhin gzhan ni rdo ba lci mo bteg pa ni
rab tu 'bad pa rnam bcom don med ngal bar gyur BCt_13.51

de bzhin gzhan rnams dred dang seng ge'i rnam pa yis
chen po'i sgra rnams mthon por rab tu sgrogs pa ste
rdo rjes bsnun pa'i nam mkha' lags pa zhes snyam nas
sems can rnams ni gang gis kun nas 'khums par gyur BCt_13.52

ri dags glang po rnams ni nyam thag skad 'don zhing
Q, p. 61arnam par 'bros shing 'thig pa nyid du gyur pa ste
de yi mtshan mor phyogs rnams las ni nyin mo bzhin
nyam thag bya rnams skad 'don yongs su babs par gyur BCt_13.53

rnam pa de ltar de rnams kyi sgra de rnams kyis
'byung po thams cas rnams su g.yos pa yin na yang
khwa rnams dag gi sgra rnams dag gis mkha' lding ltar
thub pa 'jigs pa ma yin 'khums par ma gyur to BCt_13.54

'jigs pa 'dren pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshogs rnams las
ji ltar ji ltar thub pa'i 'jigs pa ma yin pa
de ltar de ltar chos 'dzin rnams kyi dgra bo yi
bdud rnams mya ngan las dang khros nas byer ba'o BCt_13.55

de nas 'byung po cung zhig gzugs ni mthong min zhing
khyad par 'phags par gyur pa nam mkhar gnas nyid kyis
drang srong la gnod dgra ma yin la khros mthong nas
bdud lha chen po'i dbyangs kyis smras par gyur pa'o BCt_13.56

don med ngal bar byed par 'os pa ma yin bdud
'tshe ba'i bdag nyid spong la bde bar song mdzod dang
ri bo chen po lhun po rlung rnams kyis bzhin du
khyod kyis bskyod cing bsgul bar nus pa ma yin no BCt_13.57

sa yis brtan pa nyid dang chu yis gsher ba nyid
me yis dro ba nyid ni rab tu 'dor ba yang
bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bsod nams las mnga' ba
'dis ni nan tan nges par 'dor ba ma yin no BCt_13.58

'di yi nges pa gang dang pha rol gnon pa dang
gzi brjid gang dang brtse ba skye dgu rnams la ste
'od zer stong gis mun rnams ma bcom gnas bzhin du
'di ni de nyid ma thob nas ni ldang ma yin BCt_13.59

shing la bsrubs na me ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste
sa la brkos na chu yang 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid
rigs pa dang ni ldan pa'i thams cad byas pa ste
brtson 'grus Q, p. 61bldan pa'i bsgrub bya ma yin ci yang med BCt_13.60

de phyir chags sogs nad rnams dag la gnas pa yi
'jig rten nyam thag pa la thugs rje mnga' ba ni
ye shes sman gyi don du yongs su ngal ba po
sman pa chen po 'di la bgegs 'os ma yin no BCt_13.61

lam ngan mang po rnams kyis 'jig rten stor ba la
gang zhig zhi bas dam pa'i lam ni rjes tshol ba
chud zos pa la legs par ston byed ded dpon bzhin
ston mdzad de ni bskyod par rigs pa ma yin no BCt_13.62

mun pa chen po sems can chud zos rnams la ni
ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa 'di
mun pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma bzhin
'phags pa'i mya ngan 'da' bar byed par 'os ma yin BCt_13.63

'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur chu bo chen por 'gro ba ni
pha rol ma thob par ni bying bar gzigs nas ni
gang gis de ni sgrol bar byed la rab zhugs te
de la sdig pa 'phags pa su yis sems par byed BCt_13.64

bzod pa'i chu rgyus brtan pa'i rtsa ba brtan pa ste
spyod pa'i me tog blo dang dran pa'i yal ga can
ye shes ljon shing chos kyi 'bras bu ster ba po
'phel bzhin pa ni zlog par 'os pa ma yin no BCt_13.65

gang gis snying la rmongs pa'i zhags pa sra rnams kyis
bcings pa'i skye dgu rnams kyi grol phyir blo mnga' zhing
'gro ba bcings pa thar pa'i ched du 'o brgyal ba
de la brdeg pa khyed kyi 'thad pa ma yin no BCt_13.66

byang chub ched du las gang dag ni mdzad pa rnams
de rnams kyi ni nges par de ring dus yin la
ji ltar thub pa snga ma rnams ni de bzhin du
gnas der de bzhin 'di ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o BCt_13.67

dbyig 'dzin sa gzhi yi ni lte ba 'di yin zhing
snying po dam pa mtha' dag dang ni ldan pa nyid
gang zhig 'di yi ting nge 'dzin gyi Q, p. 62ashugs bzod pa'i
sa yi phyogs de 'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin BCt_13.68

de phyir khro bar ma byed zhi bar nyer song la
bdud ni khyod kyi dregs pas nga rgyal ma gyur cig
dpal ni mi brtan blo gtad par ni nus min zhing
go 'phang g.yo la rgyags par mngon par nyer 'gro ci BCt_13.69

de nas de yi tshig de yang dag thos nas kyang
thub pa chen po'i g.yo ba med pa nyid mthong nas
gang gi mda' yis 'gro ba'i snying la rdeg byed pa'i
bdud ni 'bad pa bcom zhing yid mi bde bar song BCt_13.70

dga' ba med cing 'bras med ngal ba byas pa rnams
pha ong rnams ni khyu D, p. 51amchog ljon shing rnams gtor te
dgrar gyur dgra bo'i dpung ni gtso bo bsad pa ltar
de nas 'di yi dpung ni phyogs phyogs bros pa'o BCt_13.71

me tog tog can 'khor dang bcas pa bros shing nges par 'pham pa na
drang srong chen po mun pa 'pham zhing rdul dang bral ba rgyal ba na
rgod pa dang bcas lang tsho ma bzhin zla ba dang bcas | mkha' gsal zhing
chu'i snying po can gyi dri zhes me tog char pa bab par gyur pa'o BCt_13.72

de ltar sdig pa can ni nges par pham pa na
de tshe phyogs ni rab snang mtshan mor byed pa mdzes
mkha' las me tog char rnams sa la bab pa ste
lang tsho mo bzhin ngal ba med par mtshan mo gsal BCt_13.73

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste | bcu gsum pa'o ||

G, p. 72a| de nas brtan dang zhi ba yis
bdud kyi stobs ni pham mdzad nas
don dam rnam par mkhyen bzhed pa
bsam gtan mkhas de bsam gtan mdzad BCt_14.1

bsam gtan cho ga thams cad la
dbang phyug dam pa rab brnyes nas
sngon gyi skye ba rim pa ni
dang po'i Q, p. 62bthun la dran pa'o BCt_14.2

che ge mo bdag N, p. 60aming 'di ni
de nas 'phos te 'dir 'ongs pa'o
zhes ni skye ba stong phrag rnams
rjes su myong ba bzhin du dran BCt_14.3

'thad pa de dang de rnams su
skye ba 'chi ba dran nas ni
de nas sems can la thugs rje
thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mdzad BCt_14.4

rang gi skye bo bor nas ni
slar yang gzhan du bya ba rnams
nges par 'jig rten mgon med 'di
C, p. 56b'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor BCt_14.5

de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid ni
de yi dran pa'i gyur pa ste
chi shing snying po snying po med
'khor ba de ltar nges par ro BCt_14.6

thun ni gnyis pa byung ba na
gnyis med pha rol gnon pa de
mig dang ldan pa kun gyi mchog
lha yi spyan ni thob par gyur BCt_14.7

de nas des ni lha yi spyan
yongs su dag pa de yis ni
me long dri ma med pa ltar
'jig rten mtha' dag la gzigs so BCt_14.8

mchog dag mchog min las rnams kyi
sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang
skye ba gzigs pa de yi ni
thugs rje'i bdag D, p. 51bnyid 'phel bar gyur BCt_14.9

'di rnams sdig pa'i las can rnams
srog chags rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro
'di gzhan dge ba'i las can rnams
mtho ris su ni rab gnas so BCt_14.10

shin tu mi bzad dmyal ba ru
rab tu 'jigs par gyur pa rnams
'di rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
kye ma bkren par bcer bar byed BCt_14.11

kha cig me yi kha dog gi
lcags khu khol ma 'thung bar byed
lcags kyi ka ba tshan mo la
gzhan rnams cho nges 'debs shing 'dzegs BCt_14.12

lcags zangs rnams su khas bub rnams
kha cig thug pa bzhin du 'tshod
me mdag phung po 'bar rnams su
kha cig snying rje rab sreg go BCt_14.13

kha cig Q, p. 63alcags kyi mche rno can
mi bzad khyi rnams kyis za zhing
kha cig ma rung lcags mchu can
lcags 'dra'i bya rog rnams kyis za BCt_14.14

kha cig gdung bas yongs ngal rnams
bsil ba'i grib ma mngon 'dod pas
ral gri'i lo ma'i nags sngon por
'di rnams bcings pa bzhin du zhugs BCt_14.15

kha cig sta re rnams kyis ni
lag pa bteg rnams shing ltar 'ges
las rnams kyis bzung srog rnams ni
sdug bsngal na yang rnam mi smrin BCt_14.16

sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i don ched du
bde ba yin zhes las gang byas
de yi 'bras de dbang med kyis
sdug bsngal kho na nyer longs spyod BCt_14.17

bde don mi dge ba byas nas
gang de shin tu sdug bsngal rnams
de dag rnams kyi ro myang des
bde ba phra ma yang byed dam BCt_14.18

sdig pa'i bdag nyid rgod rnams kyis
sdig pa'i las ni byas pa gang
de ni sngon dun gyur pa'i tshe
cho nge rnams kyis rjes su myong BCt_14.19

gal te de ltar sdig las can
las kyi 'bras bu mthong ba ste
dmig su mngon par bsnun pa bzhin
skyen par khrag ni skyug pa nyid BCt_14.20

lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams las dang
dmyal ba'i rnams las sems ldan gyi
'phags min rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs
ngal ba mchog ni bdag gi lugs BCt_14.21

gzhan 'di sems kyi rnam g.yo las
byung ba'i las rnams sna tshogs kyis
byol song skye gnas sna tshogs su
nye bar skyes rnams gdung ba D, p. 52acan BCt_14.22

sha lpags spu dang so yi phyir
chags pa las sam rgyags pa las
gnyen 'dun rnams kyis mthong na yang
gang du snying brje bar gsod do BCt_14.23

nus med ldan yang dbang med rnams
bkres skom ngal bas Q, p. 63bbtsir ba rnams
lcag gis bsnun pa'i dbyibs can rnams
rta dang ba lang gyur rnams 'khol BCt_14.24

btsir ] tser (Q)
lcag gis ] lcags kyis (Q)

stobs can rnams kyang stobs chung gis
glang por gyur pa rnam 'khol te
lcags kyus nyon mongs mgo bo rnams
rkang pa'i rting pa rnams kyis brdegs BCt_14.25

phan tshun rnam par rtsod las dang
gzhan gyi dbang du gyur nyid kyis
sdug bsngal gzhan rnams la spyod kyang
gang la sdug bsngal khyad par ldan BCt_14.26

phan tshun du ni rab phrad nas
skam gnas skam gnas rnams kyis dang
chur gnas chur gnas rnams kyis dang
mkhar gnas mkhar gnas rnams kyis 'joms BCt_14.27

ser snas non pa'i sems ldan rnams
yi dags 'jig rten snang med du
skyes pa 'di rnams de bzhin du
bkren pa 'bras bu la longs spyod BCt_14.28

khab mig lta bu'i kha rnams dang
ri bo lta bu'i lto ba rnams
bkres skom gyis bskyed sdug bsngal gyis
sdug bsngal skal can rnams btsir to BCt_14.29

ser sna'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba
skyes bus gal te shes na ni
lus kyi cha shas rnams kyang ni
zhi ba bzhin du kun nas gtong BCt_14.30

rang gi las rnams kyis bzung zhing
sred pas shin tu non pa rnams
bor ba'i mi gtsang ba rnams kyang
longs spyod par ni 'did mi rnyed BCt_14.31

'di gzhan dmyal ba dang mtshungs pa'i
mngal ming mi gtsang khu ba ru
nye bar skyes rnams mi rnams su
'gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal 'thob BCt_14.32

de sngon skye ba tsam na yang
lag pa rnon pos bzung ba rnams
ral gri rnams kyis gshegs pa ltar
gang du snying rje bar ni ngu BCt_14.33

byams dang bsrung dang skyong rnams kyis
gnyen 'dun rnams kyis 'bad nas sos
sdug bsngal las slar sdug bsngal drag
rang rang Q, p. 64alas kyis nyon mongs so BCt_14.34

bya ba 'di dang bya ba 'di
zhes ni gang du lhag par la
D, p. 52bsred dang yongs ldan byis rnams kyis
rgyun chad med par rjes su myong BCt_14.35

'di gzhan bsod nams las rnams kyis
mtho ris su ni skyes pa rnams
'dod chags me yis drag tu ni
me ltar rab tu sreg par byed BCt_14.36

yul rnams kyis ni ngoms med rnams
gang las 'di rnams gzi bcom ste
phreng ba yongs rnyings zhan pa rnams
gyen du mig phyogs rnam lhung ngo BCt_14.37

gang du lha mo rnams kyis ni
sdug pa dbang med ltung ba la
snying la brtse ba ltos rnams kyis
lag pa rnams kyis gos rnams 'dzin BCt_14.38

gang zhig sa la ltung ba bzhin
lung 'dod do shal g.yo rnams kyis
sdug rnams gzhal med khang rnams nas
snying rje dang bcas ltung la lta BCt_14.39

rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan phreng can
gzhan 'did sdug bsngal lhung rnams la
gdung rnams brtse dang g.yo ba yi
lta byed rnams kyis rjes su 'gro BCt_14.40

'dod pa can rnams lhung ba la
lag pa rnams kyis brang brdung zhing
'khrugs chen gyis ltar nyam thag pa
lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis brten to BCt_14.41

kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs rdzing
kyi hud sdug pa gang na zhes
nyam thag pa rnams rnam zlos shing
lha la gnas rnams sa la lhung BCt_14.42

las mang rnams kyis thob pa yi
mtho ris mi brtan g.yo ba la
'bral bas byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni
gang du 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur BCt_14.43

kye ma des las khyad par du
'jig rten mdzad pa'i chos nyid do
'dod chags bral ba thob nas kyang
gzhan rnams lha nas nges par lhung BCt_14.44

'di ni rtag par gnas pa ste
zhes ni nges pa'i sems ldan rnams
'jig rten 'di yi rang bzhin Q, p. 64bni
'di lta bur ni mthong ma yin BCt_14.45

dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal drag
dud 'gro rnams su phan tshun za
bkres skom sdug bsngal yi dags su
mi la 'tshol ba'i sdug bsngal lo BCt_14.46

lha na sdug pa dang bral bas
bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal phul byung ste
skor ba gson pa'i 'jig rten gyi
gang na zhi ba nges par med BCt_14.47

'khor ba'i chu bo rten med du
'di ni 'chi bas bskor ba D, p. 53aste
tsam tsom du ni bskor ba yi
'gro bas gnas ni thob ma yin BCt_14.48

de ltar des ni 'gro ba lnga
lha yi spyan gyis gzigs pa ste
chu shing bshags pa bzhin du ni
srid par snying po rnyed ma yin BCt_14.49

de nas de yi mtshan mo'i thun
gsum pa nye bar gans pa na
'jig rten 'di yi rang bzhin ni
bsam gtan rig pa mchog gis bsgoms BCt_14.50

kye ma 'jig rten ngal thob gang
yang dang yang du skye ba dang
'khogs pa dang ni 'chi ba dang
'pho ba dang ni skye ba nyid BCt_14.51

yang na sdug bsngal che 'di las
chags pas rmong mun gyis bsgribs pa
skyes long shin tu dogs pa nas
phyi rol 'gro ba shes ma yin BCt_14.52

de ltar bsmas pa de yis ni
thugs kyis rnam dpyod gyur pa ste
gang du gyur na nges sam zhes
rga bas 'chi ba mngon par song BCt_14.53

skye gans nas de nyid bsgoms pa
de yis mngon par rtogs par gyur
rga dang 'chi ba dag gis ni
skye ba yod na rdzogs pa'o BCt_14.54

mgo bo yod na mgo bo yi
nad 'di 'byung ba mthong ba ste
shing gi skye ba yod gyur na
'gyel ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o BCt_14.55

de nas de yi slar 'gyur pa
skye ba 'di slar gang las shes
de nas las srid las skye bar
skye ba yang dag mkhyen pa'o BCt_14.56

des ni lha yi spyan gyis ni
las las 'jug par mkhyen pa ste
dbang phyug las min rang bzhin min
bdag las ma yin rgyu med min BCt_14.57

ji ltar rigs pa las Q, p. 65agling bu
dang po'i tsheg ni bcad pa na
cho ga bzhin du kun myur 'gro
de ltar ye shes go rims so BCt_14.58

de nas srid pa'i skye ba ni
mkhyen phyir thub pas blo gros mdzad
de nas srid pa'i skye ba des
nye bar len las 'byung bar mkhyen BCt_14.59

tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang
'dod blo bdag tu lta rnams kyis
bud shing rnams kyis me bzhin du
'di yi las ni nye bar len BCt_14.60

gang gi rgyu las len pa shes
de nas de yi gyur pa ste
de nas nye bar len pa'i rkyen
sred par des ni mkhyen pa'o BCt_14.61

chung ngu'i me yis nags kyi me
rlung gis bus te bskyed pa D, p. 53bbzhin
'dod sogs nyon mongs rgya chen rnams
sred pa yis ni skyed par byed BCt_14.62

de nas de yi bsam pa yi
sred pa gang las 'byung zhes so
tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes
de nas rnam par nges pa mdzad BCt_14.63

tshor bas mngon bcom skye dgu rnams
gnyen por byed la sred pa ste
skom pa med na chu la ni
kha cig mngon par dga' ba yin BCt_14.64

de nas slar yang tshor ba yi
skye ba'i gnas ni gang zhes bsams
tshor ba tshor ba mthar byed kyis
reg pa'i rgyu can nyid du mkhyen BCt_14.65

yul dang dbang po blo rnams kyis
'dud pa reg par brjod bya ste
gtsungs shing las ni me bzhin du
gang las tshor ba skye ba'o BCt_14.66

de nas reg pa rgyu yin zhes
de yis bsam par gyur pa'o
de nas skye mched drug gi ni
rgyu can nyid du nges mkhyen to BCt_14.67

long bas gzugs ni mi rig cing
mig ni blo yis mi sbyor phyir
mig yod gyur na des sbyod to
de phyir dbang po yod na reg BCt_14.68

de nas skye mched drug gi ni
skye ba mkhyen phyir blo gros mdzad
de nas de'i rygu ming dang gzugs
rgyu la mkhas pas mkhyen pa'o BCt_14.69

Q, p. 65bji ltar myu gu yod pa las
lo ma sdong bu yod par dran
de ltar ming dang gzugs yod na
skye mched drug ni 'byung ba'o BCt_14.70

ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu gang zhes
de yi de nas gyur de nas
de yi skye ba rnam shes su
ye shes pha rol son pas mkhyen BCt_14.71

rnam par shes pas mkhyen pa na
gap: 7 syllables
gap: 7 syllables
gap: 7 syllables BCt_14.72

rnam par shes pa 'das pa na
ming dang gzugs na rig gnas te
sa bon bskrun pa rdzogs pa na
myu gu rnam par 'dzin pa'o BCt_14.73

de nas rnam par shes pa ni
gang las yin zhes bsam par gyur
mig dang gzugs la brten nas de
de nas de yi skye ba mkhyen BCt_14.74

de nas rgyu yi go rims ni
mkhyen nas de yi blor gyur te
sems ni lugs byung bskor ba ste
gzhan du lugs las bzlog par min BCt_14.75

rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ni
ming dang gzugs de skye ba ste
ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni
slar yang rnam par shes pa skye BCt_14.76

ji ltar gru yis mi 'dren zhing
gap: 7 syllables
de bzhin rnam par shes pa dang
ming gzugs phan tshun gyi rgyu'o BCt_14.77

ji ltar lcgas ni 'bar ba yis
rtswa rnams D, p. 54a'bar bar byed na yang
'bar ba de yis de gdung ste
de bzhin phan tshun rgyu nyid do BCt_14.78

de ltar rnam par shes pa las
ming gzungs 'byung ba mkhyen gyur pa
de nas dbang po 'byung 'gyur zhing
dbang po las 'byung reg pa'o BCt_14.79

reg pa las skyes tshor ba mkhyen
tshor ba las skyes sred pa'o
sred pa las skyes len pa'o
len pa las ni de bzhin srid BCt_14.80

srid pa las ni skye ba dag
skye las rga shi 'byung bar mkhyen
'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnams las
skyes shes yang dag mkhyen pa'o BCt_14.81

de nas 'di yi blo gros nges par song ba ni
skye ba zad las 'chi dang rga ba 'gag pa ste
srid pa nyams pa las skye ba nyams pa nyid
len pa 'gag pa las ni Q, p. 66asrid pa rnam ldog cing BCt_14.82

de nas sred 'gags pa las de ni 'gag pa ste
chor ba yod pa min sred pa yod ma yin
reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing
skye mched drug po med las reg pa zad pa'o BCt_14.83

de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'gags pa las
skye mched drug po thams cad rnam par nyams pa nyid
rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dag 'gag pa ste
'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o BCt_14.84

mi rig pa ni mtha' dag med las de bzhin du
'du byed 'gag par drang srong chen pos mkhyen pa ste
'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas
sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur BCt_14.85

yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar ba yi
rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni
srid rtse'i bar las mchog gyur bdag med rnam gzigs nas
bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur BCt_14.86

de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur pa ni
mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i tshogs
mna' ma rnams kyi don dam rgyu las gshegs pa yi
snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur BCt_14.87

thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar ba'i yud tsam na
rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi D, p. 54bba na
drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang
kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so BCt_14.88

de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pa na
bud med chang gis myos bzhin sa ni g.yos gyur la
grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste
nam mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur BCt_14.89

dge ba'i rlung rnams rab tu zhi bar g.yos gyur cing
sprin med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste
ljon shing rnams las Q, p. 66bdus min me tog 'bras ba rnams
mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin 'bu bar gyur BCt_14.90

ma-ndā ra ba'i me to rnams dang pa-dma dang
gser dang bai ḍū rya yi rang bzhin pa-dma ni
mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis shākya thub pa'i sa
de tshe mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur BCt_14.91

yud tsam de ni kha cig khro med gyur la
nad med gyur cing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste
sdig pa bsnyen pa ma yin rgyags par ma byas shing
grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur BCt_14.92

thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste
sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur
yon tan phyogs kyi 'phel bas chos ni rgyas pa ste
rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung BCt_14.93

de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi
bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams
rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis
yang dag mchod rnams mkha' la gzhal med rnams su gnas BCt_14.94

mthong min 'byung po'i tshogs kyi drang srong chen po yis
bstod pa rnams ni mthon por 'thon zhing sgrogs pa ste
gson pa'i 'jig rten 'phel ba bzhin du dga' gyur zhing
ltung ba mtshog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug gyur BCt_14.95

de nas nad mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyi
sems la gzigs shing spyan mi 'dzum par bzhugs pa ste
kho bos 'dir ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes
thub pa yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur BCt_14.96

de nas rkyen nyid thob pa 'di ni thub pa nyid
bdag med D, p. 55acho gar rnam par bzhag pas gson nas ni
zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bas so
sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o BCt_14.97

lta ba ngan pas Q, p. 67achud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa yi
'gro ba rdul ni rga chen dang ldan gzigs nas dang
rnam thar chos ni mchog tu phra ba nyid gzigs nas
g.yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni mdzad par gyur BCt_14.98

de nas sngon gyi dam bca' yang dag mkhyen gyur nas
zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so sor nges par gshegs
de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang
ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o BCt_14.99

de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni
gzung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ni shes gyur nas
mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can
mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo gnyis ni nye bar 'ongs BCt_14.100

sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa'o
mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so
mchog tu zhi bas rab tu bsod nas de gnyid kyis
'jig rten phan pa'i don du tshig 'di gsol ba'o BCt_14.101

e ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu
skye dgu rnams la rjes su brtse mdzod khyod kyi thugs
'jig rten na yod skye bo rnam par bsre ba'i rgyu
chen po rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid ldan pa'o BCt_14.102

thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab brgal nas
'gro ba sdug bsngal bying ba rab tu drongs mdzod cig
legs pa'i dbang phyug gis ni phun sum tshogs pa theb nas bzhin
gzhan rnams la yang rang gi yon tan gyis spyor mdzod BCt_14.103

don mkhyen 'di na'i don dang pha rol du 'am gang
skye bo kha cig 'di ni bdag gi phan pa byed
gang zhig 'jig rten dge ba'i ched du rab zhugs de
mi yi 'jig rten dang ni mtho ris su rnyed dka' BCt_14.104

de ltar drang srong che la tshig 'di gsol nas ni
lha na gnas pa de nyid ji ltar Q, p. 67b'ongs par gshegs
thub pa yis kyang de yi tshig de rab mno nas
'gro ba rnm par thar D, p. 55bphyir nges par rgyas par mdzad BCt_14.105

de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la
lha na gnas pas lhung bzod rnams ni phul ba ste
gau ta mas bzhi po de rnams rab bzhes nas
de yi chos kyi ched du gcig nyid mdzad pa'o BCt_14.106

de nas de tshe don bcas rab song tshong dpon gnyis
mdza' bshes nyid kyi lha yis rab tu bskul ba dag
rgya chen thugs mnga' drang srong che la thog ma ru
dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms phul BCt_14.107

rtsibs 'phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni
chos 'dzin nus pa'i blo gros thub pas gzigs pa ste
de gnyis lha na gshegs par thub kyis mngon gzigs nas
dge slong lnga po rnams la thugs kyis gshegs pa'o BCt_14.108

'phur ] 'phun (W)

de nas zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni gau ta mas
nyi ma shar bas mun bzhin mun pa rnam 'joms phyir
ba rā ṇa ses brgyan pa'i sna tshogs nags tshal can
'jigs byed shing rtas bsnyed pa'i grong khyer dge bar gshegs BCt_14.109

de nas khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' glang chen myos pa'i 'gros ldan pa
'gro ba mngon par rnam par 'dus phyir kā shi sa la gshegs bzhed pa
glang chen bzhin du rang gi sku lus ma lus phyir la rab log nas
thub pas spyan mig mi 'dzum par ni byang chub shing gi rtsa bar gzigs BCt_14.110

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ||

N, p. 65a|| zhi zhing mdangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de
gcig bur rab gshrnamsgs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin
lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas
ya mtshan Q, p. 68adang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol BCt_15.1

dbang po'i rta ni g.yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing
sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur
shin tu ro ldan gsar ba'i shes rab ro yis ni
ri bong gis G, p. 78bmtshan dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnam BCt_15.2

brtan pa'i khyod kyi zhal ni rab rgyas shing 'dir ni
dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste
khyu mchog chen D, p. 56apo'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing
khyod kyi bla ma su lags gang las grub pa gsungs BCt_15.3

de rnams las des smras pa bdag la ston pa med
bdag la mchod bya med cing su yang smad bya med
mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam
bdag ni chos la rab byung du ni shes par mdzod BCt_15.4

gang phyir ngzan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni
bdag gis mtha' dag rtogs pa de phyir dangs rgyas te
gang phyir bdag gis nyon mongs rnams ni drag bzhin pham
de phyir zhi ba bdag ni kun nas shes par mdzod BCt_15.5

sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du
zhi ba kho bo 'di yang ba rā ṇa ser 'gro
der ni 'chi med chos kyi rnga dag brdung ba ste
snyan grags bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin BCt_15.6

rgal bas 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing
grol bas sems can ni yongs su thar bar bgyi
de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag mthong nas
sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'di ni gyur pa'o BCt_15.7

'di ni kha cig ni thob nas bdag nyid ni
gcig pu nyid gang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing
skye bo chen po ma btsum mig la gang gis kyang
khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin BCt_15.8

gang zhig skam la gnas pa mi ni chus khyer ba
Q, p. 68b'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin
gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la
nor gyis sbyor ba med pa de spyang po min BCt_15.9

rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par bcom pa la
lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso bar bar rigs pa ste
de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam bdag ni
nges par bya ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin BCt_15.10

ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste
de yis rgyu dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid
de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes rab gsal bar
mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no BCt_15.11

ji ltar shing rnams la ni me dag nges pa dang
mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste
de bzhin D, p. 56bgang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyi ni
byang chub nges shing kā shi rnams dang chos smra gzha nges BCt_15.12

gang yang (D N) ] ga ya (W)

de nas nye bar 'ongs la a la la zhes pa
rnam par brjod nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spangs nas
yang dang yang du ya mstah mig ni g.yo ba yis
de 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lta bzhin song BCt_15.13

de nas thub pas rim gyis kā shi'i grong khyer ni
nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste
grogs mo bzhin du 'khyud nas yang dag 'dus pa 'di
skal ldan shing rta dang ni ba rā ṇa se nyid BCt_15.14

mthu dang gzi brjid dag gis mngon par mdzes pa des
khu byug rnams kyi sgra sgrogs shing gi tshogs ldan zhing
drang srong chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dags nags nyid du
rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab thob bp BCt_15.15

kauṇ ḍi nya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang
rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te
dge slong lnga yis de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas
phan tshun du ni tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o BCt_15.16

bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong gau ta ma 'di
dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par Q, p. 69a'ongs pa ste
mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min
dam bca' bcom pa mchod par 'os pa ma yin no BCt_15.17

de ni brgya la gal te sdod par 'dod gyur na
de nyid la ni gtam ni rab tu gsol mdzad dang
'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni
'phags pa rnams kyi mi byed par ni 'os ma yin BCt_15.18

de ltar bya byas nas dge slong de rnams ni
nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste
ji lta ji ltar de rnams la ni nye bar gshegs
de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur BCt_15.19

de nas kha cig 'di yi na bza' blangs pa ste
de bzhin gzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung
kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gdan ni phul ba ste
de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul ba'o BCt_15.20

de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams
'di la thams cad kyis ni bla mar spyod pa byas
rigs su mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing
de rnams la rjes brtse bcas D, p. 57abcom ldan kyis smras pa BCt_15.21

mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas
sngar gyi spyod pas dge slong rnams kye ma smra zhig
bstod dang smad pa nges parbdag gi mnyam pa ste
khyod rnams bsod nams min las rnam par zlog par bgyi BCt_15.22

sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas shing
'byung po kun la phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la
bla ma nye bar 'joms la ming gis gang smra ste
ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chong ngo BCt_15.23

de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can
smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis de skad gsungs pa ste
rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis
gdong ni cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan rgol smras pa'o BCt_15.24

gau ta ma re zhig dka' thub mchog dang ni
dam pa de yid de nyid rtogs pa Q, p. 69bma yin te
don ni dka' bas bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o
khyod kyi mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang BCt_15.25

gang tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la
de nas dge slong de rnams dad par gyur min te
byang chub pa yi lam ni de las gzhan du shes
de nas lam mkhyen pa yis lam ni bka' stsal pa BCt_15.26

byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang
dbang po'i spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste
'chi ba med pa'i lung gi lam ma yin pa'i phyogs
skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la bltos mdzod cig BCt_15.27

gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis
yongs su 'khrugs shing rnam par gnon pa'i sems la ni
'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgyal shes min ni
dbang po las 'das de nyid lam ni kye ma ci BCt_15.28

ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru
'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min
de bzhin ye shes me yis mi shes mun pa ni
nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis min BCt_15.29

ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang
rnam par 'ges pas me ni thob pa ma yin la
de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsgrubs pas thob pa ste
de bzhin sbyor las 'chi D, p. 57bba med thob ngal bas min BCt_15.30

bas (D) ] las (W)

de ltar don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni
rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams
bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na
chags bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid do BCt_15.31

ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'i srog chags kyi
mi phan bza' ba za ba'i gso ba 'dir yod min
de bzhin mi shes nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'o
'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so BCt_15.32

ji ltar skam po'i rten la Q, p. 70agnas pa'i rlung gis ni
bus pa'i me yi zhi ba yod pa ma yin no
de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis
rjes su song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma min BCt_15.33

mtha' 'di gnyis pa dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas
bdag gis lam gzhan dbu mas lhag par rtogs pa ste
shin tu sdig bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i 'dren pa'o
bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o BCt_15.34

yang dag lta ba'i nyi mas rab tu gsal byas shing
rnam dag yang dag rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa ste
yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag ngag ni gtsug lag khang
dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga' BCt_15.35

smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo legs chen po ste
yang dag rtsol bas stobs dang rjes su 'gro ba can
kun tu yang dag dran pa'i sbas pas sbas pa ste
ting 'dzin gzims mal dang ni gdan dang bzhugs pa yis BCt_15.36

de ltar mchog gi yan lag brgyad 'dir 'di lam ste
'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las 'dren pa'o
gang las drangs nas bya ba thams cad byas pa ste
'di dang che ge mor ni slar yang 'gro ba med BCt_15.37

'di ni sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'di ni mtshan ma ste
'di ni 'gog pa 'di yi lam ni 'di yin te
de ltar ma thos chos kyi cho ga sngar med pa'i
rnam par thar phyir bdag gi spyan mig skyes pa'o BCt_15.38

skye dang rga dang na dang de nas rgud pa dang
sdug pa dang bral mi sdug pa dang sbyor ba dang
'dod pa'i don ni rab tu thob pa med pa ste
rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs su 'thob BCt_15.39

'dod pa'i bdag can gyi 'am bdag rgyal can gyi 'am
lus D, p. 58acan gyi 'am yang na lus can ma yin pa'i
gang zhig yon tan med pa gang la rab zhugs kyang
mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal du ni shes par mdzod BCt_15.40

ji ltar 'bar ba zhi ba'i me ni chung na yang
lhan cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid
Q, p. 70bde bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang
sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges BCt_15.41

ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin
'dod chags la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs skyon rnams dang
skyon las rab tu skyes pa'i las rnams nyid dag ni
sdug bsngal dag gi rgyur ni nges par shes par mdzod BCt_15.42

mtho ris su 'am 'og tu srid pa'i rgyun la ni
'dod chags la sogs skyon gyi tshogs rnams rgyu yin zhing
dman dang 'bring dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni
de dang der ni las rnams dag ni rtsa ba'o BCt_15.43

nyes pa zad las 'khor ba'i rgyu ni yod min te
las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin
gang phyir don gang yod pa las ni kun 'byung ste
de phyir med pa las de slar yang 'byung ba med BCt_15.44

gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba med
me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la
thog ma bar dang mtha' med 'phags pa dgrog bya min
dge zhing 'gyur med 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod BCt_15.45

yan lag brgyad ldan gang zhig mngon brjod de lam ste
lhag par rtogs phyir 'di yi thabs de'i gzhan ma yin
lam 'di yi ni ma mthong ba las 'jig rten rnams
de nyid dang ni nye du rnams ni yongs su 'khor BCt_15.46

sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhing rgyu 'di ni
spang bya 'gog pa yang ni dbang du bya'o
de bzhin lam 'di yang ni bsgom par bya ba ste
de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi blo gros rab zhugs so BCt_15.47

sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste
de bzhin du ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa'o
de bzhin du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste
de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugs so BCt_15.48

ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni
bzhi pa'i rkang pa 'di rnams mthong ba ma yin pa
de srid bdag 'dir grol ba med par Q, p. 71azhes brjod cing
bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang ma D, p. 58bmthong BCt_15.49

gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste
rtogs nas kyang ni don byar 'os pa byas pa'o
de tshe bdag nyid rnam par grol zhes brjod pa ste
bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mthong ngo BCt_15.50

de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje mnga' ba yi
'dir ni chos dag de skad mngon par gsungs pa na
kau ṇḍi nya'i rigs dang lha ni brgya phrag rnams
gtsang zhing rdul dang bral ba'i mig ni thob par gyur BCt_15.51

bya ba thams cad nges par byas shing zhi ba de la ni
thams cad mkhyen pas khyu mchog bzhin du mthon po'i dbyangs kyis gsungs
khyod kyi ye shes bdag nyid chen pos des ni tshig gsol ba
legs so khyod kyi blo gros mchog ni bdag gis shes pa'o BCt_15.52

legs so bdag gis shes shes de nas des ni 'jig rten ni
kau ṇḍi nyas de'i go 'phang rig ni bzung ba ste
bla ma dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa slob ma rnams kyi ni
gtso bo nyid du chos la yang dag lhag par gshegs pa'o BCt_15.53

sgra de sa la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis thos nas ni
rnam par rgyas pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu gsol bar gyur pa ste
'byung po rnams kyi 'chi med zhi ba'i ched du nges par ni
dam pa gzigs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de legs so BCt_15.54

tshul khrims rtsibs dang zhi dang dul ba'i mu khyud blo rnam yangs
dran pas blo gros brtan pa brtson 'grus lte ba ngo tsha'i gzer
zab pa'i phyir dang rdzun med phyir dang legs par bstan nyid phyir
'jig rten gsum na btsan zhing bstan bcos gzhan rnams kyis mi ldog BCt_15.55

sa 'dzin gnod sbyin rnams las sgra ni nye bar thob byas nas
mkha' la lha yi tshogs rnams kyis ni dbyangs byas shing
de ltar thos nas mtho ris rim dang rim rnams kyis mthon por
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du sgra yis nye bar 'dzegs pa'o BCt_15.56

Q, p. 71bmtho ris dag na gnas pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa kha cig gis
drang srong che las 'jig rten gsum ni g.yos zhes thos nas ni
sna tshogs yul rnams la ni chags par gshegs pa ma yin zhing
yang dag skye las D, p. 59asrid pa gsum na zhi ba nyid du gshegs BCt_15.57

de ltar 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog tu zhi ba'i ched du ni
mtho ris dang ni sa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tsam nas
sprin nral mkha' las me tog dang bcas chu yi char bab cing
srid gsum gnas pa rnams kyis rnga bo che rnams mngon par brdungs BCt_15.58

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bcu lnga pa'o ||

de nas thams cad mkhyen pa yis
rta thul la sogs dge slong rnams
rab snyoms sems ldan de rnams kun
thar pa'i chos la bkod pa'o BCt_16.1

G, p. 83a| nyi ma dang ldan skar ma lngas
nam mkhar zla ba ldan pa bzhin
lnga ste tham pa'i lnga sde yis
kun nas bskor ba de mdzes sp BCt_16.2

de nas de tshe kha cig ni
mo rnams blo phab nyal mthong nas
grags pa zhes bya chen po'i bu
yang dag skyo bar nye bar song BCt_16.3

'di kun nye bar brtse ba ste
zhes ni tshig dang brjod bzhin du
dpal ldan mchog gi rgyan ldan pa
sangs rgyas ga la ba der song BCt_16.4

sems dang nyon mongs mkhyen pas des
gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
mya ngan 'das la nyer tshe med
tshur shog dge ba thob par gyis BCt_16.5

de ltar rnam rgyas grags pa'i gsung
'di ni thos nas tsha ba yis
nyam thag chu la 'dzul nas ltar
mchog tu tshim pa nye bar song BCt_16.6

sngon gyi rgyu yi stobs brten nas
de nas lus de nyid bzung ste
lus kyis dang ni sems kyis ni
dgra bcom nyid ni nye bar thob BCt_16.7

ston ga'i chu yis bkrus pa yi
gos la tshon ni bkod pa bzhin
dkar po'i blo yis dam pa'i chos
thos nas rab tu rtogs pa nyid BCt_16.8

cha lugs de yi ngo tsha bzhin
gnas pa de ni gzigs Q, p. 72agyur na
don mdzad dam pa'i don mkhyen pa
smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis smras BCt_16.9

rtags ni chos kyi rgya min zhing
N, p. 69a| 'byung po rnams la snyoms pa ste
zhi zhing dul la dbang po dul
brgyan pa yin D, p. 59byang chos la spyod BCt_16.10

gang zhig lus ni 'thon pa ste
sems kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa
nags na gnas kyang chags pa can
khyim na gnas shes de shes bya BCt_16.11

gang zhig sems ni 'thon pa ste
lus kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa
khyim na gnas kyang nga med pa
nags na gnas shes de shes bya BCt_16.12

khyim na gnas par gyur pa'i 'am
rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i yang
ngag gi bsgrubs pa yod na ni
de yi thar pa mngon par brjod BCt_16.13

ji ltar rgyal 'dod dgra sde la
rgyal phyir go cha 'dzin pa ste
de bzhin nyon mongs dgra de la
rgyal phyir rtags ni 'dren pa'o BCt_16.14

de nas dge slong tshur shog ces
de bzhin gshegs pa de la gsungs
des ni dge slong rtags bzung ste
skad cig de nyid gyis grol to BCt_16.15

de nas de yi rjes chags pas
de yi 'khor ni lnga bcu dang
gsum rnams nyid dang gcig nyid dang
chos de rab tu thob par gyur BCt_16.16

'dag chal gyis bsgos gos rnams ni
chu yis yang dag reg pa bzhin
sngon tshe bsgoms pa'i las can rnams
de rnams myur du dag par gyur BCt_16.17

de nas de tshe dgra bcom slob ma yi
dang po don bcas drug cu thams cad la
dgra bcom rnams kyis mngon mchod dgra bcom pas
ji ltar 'os par yang dag bka' stsal to BCt_16.18

dge slong rnams kye sdug bsngal rgal
rang gi bya ba legs chen byas
pha rol sdug bsngal rnams la yang
rjes su 'dzin pa byed pa'i rigs BCt_16.19

de phyir re re thams cad kyis
sa 'dir yongs su gshegs mdzod la
nyam thag 'jig rten ched du chos
rjes su brtse bas bsnyan par bya BCt_16.20

grub phyir rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i spun
'od srungs drang srong rnams Q, p. 72b'dul phyir
rgyal po'i drang srong gis bsnyen pa'i
ga yar kho bo 'di yang 'gro BCt_16.21

de nas de nyid mthong de rnams
de yi bka' las phyogs su song
rtsod bral bde bar gshegs pa ni
drang srong che yang ga yar gshegs BCt_16.22

de nas dus su der gshegs nas
chos kyi dgon pa nye bar gshegs
dka' thub dngos su gnas D, p. 60apa bzhin
der ni 'od srungs gzigs pa'o BCt_16.23

ri rnams dang ni nags rnams su
gnas rnams yod pa na yang ste
rnam par 'dul bzhes stobs bcu bas

rab tu brten nas blangs pa'o BCt_16.26

d: Auch in D fehlt der entsprechende Text. Nach Johnston ist Wellers 26d tatsächlich 24d.

de nas grub pa nyams tshad phyir
me khang lto 'phye ches gap: 2 syllables
gap: 5 syllables bnyen par
ma rungs gnas des 'di la byin BCt_16.27

phyir (D) ] pyir (W)
bnyen (W) ] bsnyen (D)

der gzigs mtshan mor rang gnas shing
ltos bral thub pa chen po la
mthong ba'i dug can khros pa yi
sbrul des mthong nas dbugs phyung ngo BCt_16.28

de yi khro bas 'bar ba yi
me yi khang par gyur pa des
drang srong chen po'i sku lus la
'jigs pa bzhin du mes ma reg BCt_16.29

dus mtha'i me nyer zhi ba na
tshangs pa bzhugs pa mdzes pa ltar
me yi khang par bsregs na yang
gau ta ma rnam 'gyur med BCt_16.30

gang tshe sangs rgyas der bzhugs tshe
gnon med g.yo ba med pa ste
de tshe klu de ya mtshan zhing
drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal lo BCt_16.31

ri dags nags der skye ba yi
thub pa der bzhigs shes gyur nas
sdug pa'o brgyal 'di 'dra ba'i
dge slong tshig ces rjes su brtse BCt_16.32

de nas mtshan mo 'das pa na
rnam par 'dren pas 'od srungs la
sbrul ni zhi bas lhung bzed kyis
blangs nas de la bstan pa'o BCt_16.33

de nas sangs rgyas che bdag nyid
thos nas de ni ya mtshan gyur
de lta na yang bdag nyid kyis
che zhing gong na med pa snyam BCt_16.34

de nas dus su rab sbyar ba'i
sna tshogs rdzi 'phral gzugs Q, p. 73arnams kyis
de yi sems de mkhyen nyid las
zhi ldan thub pas thugs dgongs mdzad BCt_16.35

ji ltar bdag las rdzu 'phrul gyis
sangs rgyas khyad par 'phags pa snyam
de yi chos ni rab bsgrub phyir
de tshe des ni nges par byas BCt_16.36

kun nas slar log gnas pa yi
lteng rgyas 'od srungs mthong nas ni
slob pa rnams kyi tshogs rnams kyang
lnga brgyas de yi chos la bsnyen BCt_16.37

der ni spun zla slob mar bcas
mthar phyin shun lpags spangs pa na
ga ya chu klung zhes byas kyang
der song lam la bsnyen pa'o BCt_16.38

de nas thub pas slob mar bcas
'od srungs gsum po de rnams la
sa 'dzin ga ya'i rtse mor D, p. 60bni
nges par mthar phyin gtam mdzad do BCt_16.39

rnam par rtogs pa'i skye gnas dang
gti mug rnam bkram du ba can
chags sdang me yis 'gro ba ni
thams cad dbang med par sreg go BCt_16.40

de ltar nyon mongs mes tshig cing
rab tu ma zhi mgon med can
rga na 'chi ba'i me rnams kyis
slar yang rgyun mi chad par sreg BCt_16.41

rnam par sna tshogs mes tshig pa'i
'gro ba skyabs med 'di mthong nas
yid bcas dbang po dang bcas pa'i
gzugs la blo ldan skyo ba ste BCt_16.42

skyo ba las ni chags bral 'gro
chags bral las ni rnam grol zhing
rnam 'grol de nas thams cad na
rnam par grol zhes shes pa'o BCt_16.43

skye ba'i rgyun ni yongs mdzad cing
tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'dir gnas la
byed pa thams cad byas pa ste
srid pa gzhan ni yod ma yin BCt_16.44

bcom ldan gyi gzung 'di thos nas
dge slong stong phrag dag gi sems
len pa med nas zag pa las
de ma thag tu rnam par grol BCt_16.45

sbyin pa tshul khrims dul rnams kyis
chos ni dngos su yongs bskor bzhin
de nas shes rab rgya che ba'i
'od srungs gsum gyis sangs rgyas mdzes BCt_16.46

Q, p. 73bchos don 'dod pa dang bral ba'i
sems can na ba'i srog bzhin du
bkris mchog de rnams kyis bor ba'i
dka' thub nags de mdzes ma gyur BCt_16.47

de nas de rnams kyis yongs bskor
thub pa rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs
ma ga dha yi mi dbang phyir
sngon gyi dam bca' dran pa'o BCt_16.48

de nas 'od ma'i tshal yul ni
de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu thob
blon po rnams ni rjes 'gro bas
thos nas rgyal po mngon du song BCt_16.49

de nas rang gi skal mtshungs pa'i
rkang pa gzhon mas skye bo ni
ya mtshan gyis ni rnam yangs mig
ri yi lam nas phyi rol byung BCt_16.50

ma ga dha yi mi dbang gis
thub rgyang ma nas mthong nas
skyen pa dang bcas mchod pa'i phyir
shing rta las ni sa la bab BCt_16.51

des ni rnga yab rlung yab dang
rjes su 'brang pa rnams spangs nas
tshangs pa la ni dbang pos bzhin
thub la rgyal po sngon du song BCt_16.52

cod pan rab g.yo mgon po yis
drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal nas
sa yi logs la rtswa 'jam la
mngon par rjes gnang D, p. 61absdad pa'o BCt_16.53

der mi rnams kyi bsmas pa gyur
e ma shā kya thub pa'i stogs
'od srungs bcom ldan drang srong ni
'di yi slob ma nyid du gyur BCt_16.54

de nas de'i sems sangs rgyas kyis
mkhyen nas 'od srungs la smras pa
'od srungs yon tan gang mthong nas
khyed kyis me ni spangs pa'o BCt_16.55

chu sbyin chen po'i dbyangs kyis ni
bla mas de ltar de bskul te
mthon pos skye bo kun khyab par
thal mo sbyar zhing rnam par gsol BCt_16.56

gang phyir mchod dang sbyin sreg gi
'bras bu yongs su 'khor ba ste
sems dang sna tshogs dang ldan te
de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs BCt_16.57

gang phyir yul la skom pa yis
bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs 'jug
yul rnams dag gi skom pa med
de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs BCt_16.58

gang phyir bzlas nas Q, p. 74asreg nas kyang
skye ba las ni thar min zhing
skye ba yi ni sdug bsngal che
de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs BCt_16.59

gang phyir mchod sbyin dka' thub kyis
dge legs yin zhes yid 'gyur ba
de ni brdzun pa nyid yin te
de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs BCt_16.60

gang phyir skye 'chi las grol ba
'gyur med go 'phang dge bar ni
brjod pa bdag gis shes pa ste
de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs BCt_16.61

de ltar de'i tshig dad skyed cing
don dang ldan pa'i gsan gyur nas
'dul ba'i slob dpon gau ta mas
dul ba'i 'od srungs la gsungs so BCt_16.62

skal chen khyod ni legs par 'ongs
'di ni legs byas byas min min
gang khyod tha dad chos rnams su
dge legs gang de nye bar thob BCt_16.63

de phyir re zhig dkor rnams ni
rnam rgyas yang dag 'phel ba bzhin
sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul ston bzhin du
yid ni yang dag skyo bar gyis BCt_16.64

de nas mchog ces smras nas ni
bdag la bdag ni yongs bsdus nas
mkha' 'gro'i bya ltar 'od srungs ni
klung gi lam la 'phur ba'o BCt_16.65

de mkhar sdod du'am bzhin gnas shing
sa la bzhin du rnam par rgyu
khri la bzhin du bzhugs pa dang
rdzu 'phrul mkhas pa gzims pa'o BCt_16.66

slar yang me bzhin 'bar ba dang
slar yang sprin bzhin char 'bab ste
slar yang cig car shin tu ni
'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa'o BCt_16.67

glog gi sna ba'i 'od ldan pa'i
D, p. 61brab 'bab chu gter sprin bzhin du
'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa yis
rgya cher rnam par gnon te mdzes BCt_16.68

gter (D N) ] ster (W)

der ni mig rnams chags byas nas
ya mtshan gyen phyogs skye bo rnams
mchod mang po las phyag 'tshal zhing
seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs pa'o BCt_16.69

de nas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas des
bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni
bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan zhes
thub la mgo bos Q, p. 74bphyag tshal lo BCt_16.70

drang srong mchog la de bzhin du
phyag 'tshal 'od srungs rab mthong nas
bde bar gshegs la kun mkhyen zhes
ma ga dha pa rnam nges so BCt_16.71

de nas zhing byas mkhyen nas ni
dge phyir dge legs la gnas pas
chos thos par ni 'dod pa yi
bzo sbyangs la ni bka' stsal pa BCt_16.72

gzi chen ldan pa yid bcas shing
dbang po thul ba dbang por bcas
sa yi bdag po gzugs nyid ni
skye ba dang ni rnam par nyams BCt_16.73

yon tan 'phel phyir 'di yi ni
skye dang 'gag pa shes bya ste
shes nas de gnyis yang dag par
lus ni yang dag rig par mdzod BCt_16.74

skye dang 'gag pa'i chos can du
dbang po dang bcas lus shes nas
bdag ldan bdag ces cung zhig ni
nye bar len min zer 'gro min BCt_16.75

lus dang dbang po blo rnams las
gzhan ni dmigs pa ma yin te
sdug bsngal nyid ni skye ba ste
sdug bsngal nyid ni 'gag pa'o BCt_16.76

gang tshe 'di kun mngon par 'gro
bdag med bdag gi ba yang med
de tshe mchog tu mi g.yo ba'i
mya ngan 'das pa thob pa'o BCt_16.77

ngar 'dzin la sogs nyon mongs kyis
bdag tu 'dzin la 'ching ba ste
'jig rten bdag med par mthong na
chags pa rnams las rnam par grol BCt_16.78

mi bden par mthong 'ching ba ste
bden par mthong ba rnam par grol
bdag yod ces ni 'jig rten 'dir
rab tu 'jug 'di bden mi 'dzin BCt_16.79

gal te bdag yod gyur na de
rtag gam yang na mi rtag nyid
phyogs ni gnyis po 'di dag la
nyes pa chen po rab tu chags BCt_16.80

gal te re zhig mi rtag gyur
las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur
yang srid yod pa ma yin zhing
thar pa 'bad pa med par 'gyur BCt_16.81

ci ste rtag cing khyab par 'gyur
skye ba med dang skye ba min
nam mkha' khyab cing rtag pa ni
D, p. 62a'grong ba med cing skye ba med BCt_16.82

'grong (W) ] 'god (D Q)
Q, p. 75a

gal te bdag 'di khyab bdag 'gyur
gang du mi gnas pa ma yin
'di dang song nas dang thar bar
thams cad du ni cig cag 'gyur BCt_16.83

khyab bdag nyid phyir bya med 'di'i
las kyi bya ba med par 'gyur
las rnams ma byas pa las ni
'bras bur sbyor bar gang gis 'gyur BCt_16.84

gal te 'di yis byed par 'gyur
bdag gi sdug bsngal byed ma yin
rang dbang gyur na sdug bsngal ni
bdag gis bdag gi byed pa su BCt_16.85

bdag ni rtag pa nyid las ni
rnam par 'gyur ba skye min zhing
bde dang sdug bsngal thob pa las
de yi rnam par 'gyur ba mthong BCt_16.86

ye shes thob pas dang nyon mongs
spangs las thar pa yod pa ste
bya med khyab bdag 'di yi ni
de phyir thar pa yod ma yin BCt_16.87

yod min gyur las de nyid kyis
bdag ste 'di ni brjod min la
rgyur gyur pas kyang ma yin zhing
'di ni cung zad byed ma yin BCt_16.88

bya ba las kyang gsal min zhing
gang rnams kyis 'di byas min la
rnam pa de ltar gyur min smra
de phyir bdag gis yod ma yin BCt_16.89

byed pa po med 'dir ni rig pa po yang med
bdag po med pa'i lus po 'di ni 'dren par byed
ji ltar 'khor ba'i chu bo rab tu bskor ba ste
smra ba de ni nyon mdzod nyan pa rnams ki mchog BCt_16.90

dbang po drug dang dbang po'i spyod yul drug rnams la
brten nas rnam par shes pa rnam drug 'char ba ste
gsum po so sor reg pa'icho ga rab bskyor zhing
gang las dran dang blo dang las kyis 'jug par yin BCt_16.91

nor bu bud shing nyi ma yang dag phrad pa las
ji ltar me ni sbyar ba'i dbang gis skye ba ste
de bzhin blo dang dbang don dbang po la brten nas
skyes bu la brten bya ba rnams ni thams cad 'gyur BCt_16.92

ji ltar bon las ni myu gu skye ba ste
myu gu des ni sa bon de ni shes min zhing
gzhan las gzhan du ma Q, p. 75byin de la de ma yin
de bzhin lus dang dbang po blo yi rim pa'o BCt_16.93

de ltar thub pa mchog gi gzung ni mchog tu dge
dam pa'i don du bsngags pa yang dag thos nas ni
dri ma med pa'i rdul med gzhal du med pa'i
ma ga dha yi bdag po chos mig skyes par gyur BCt_16.94

'khor der ma ga dha yi grong na D, p. 62bgnas pa yi
mi ni du ma rnams dang lha na gnas pa rnams
thub pa'i gsung thob pa la rnam dag bsam ldan rnams
'gyur med 'chi ba med pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur BCt_16.95

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las | slob ma mang po dang ldan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ||

de nas rgyal po des ni thub la rnam gnas phyir
dpal ldan nags tshal 'od ma'i tshal ni rab phul nas
de nyid khong du chud phyir kun nas gnyis pa ni
mngon par rjes gnang byas pa grong khyer la zhugs so BCt_17.1

de nas gtsug lag khang der 'grol phan pa'i phyir
ye shes las gyur dge ba'i sgron pa bsnams pa ste
tshangs dang lha dang de bzhin 'phags pa rnams kyis ni
gnas pa de dang de yis sangs rgyas rnam par gnas BCt_17.2

de nas rta thul dbang po'i rta ni kun bsdams shing
bsod snyoms 'dod pas rgyal po'i khab ni rab thob ste
gzugs G, p. 88akyis dang ni zhi ba yis dang rnam 'gyur gyis
skye bo chen po rnams kyi mig rnams phrog par gyur BCt_17.3

kyis (D) ] kyi (G)

ser skya'i rigs kyi dge slong slob C, p. 69ama du ma can
sha ra dwa ti'i bu zhes rab tu grags pa yis
dbang po zhi bar 'ongs pa de ni mthong ba ste
lam na rjes su gnas nas tshig ni mngon par smras BCt_17.4

khyod kyi gsar ba'i rtags mtshan dang ni zhi ba nyid
mthong nas kho bo'i blo gros ya mtshan mchog gyur te
de phyir re zhig gal te de nyid rig pa dang
khyod kyi ston pa'i mtshan ci smra ba gang yin smros BCt_17.5

Q, p. 76ade ltar mchod mang sngon 'gro bram ze de yis ni
de skad brjod cing rta thul gyis kyang smras pa ste
bu ram shing pa'i rigs su rab 'khrung thams cad mkhyen
bdag gi ston pa bla na med pa shes par mdzod BCt_17.6

byis pa gsar bu chos las skyes par gyur pa yis
khyod la ston pa brjod par nus pa ma yin no
smras pa mkhyen pa'i mchog gyur thub pa chen po'i gsungs
nyung ngu cung zad tsam zhig nges par rtogs par mdzod BCt_17.7

gang zhig chos rnams mtshan ma las ni byung ba ste
de dag rnams kyi mtshan ma bcom ldan gyis gsungs shing
gang zhig de dag rnams kyi nges par 'gog pa dang
yang dag 'gog pa de yi thabs gang gsungs D, p. 63apa'o BCt_17.8

de ltar rta thul gyi ni tshig 'di thos nas ni
gnyis skyes nyer rgyal zhes pa'i ming can de yi ni
skyen par chos la mig ni rdul dang bral ba ni
dge zhing rnam par nges par gyur pa'o BCt_17.9

rgyu med pa dang bya ba med dang dbang phyug ste
zhing shes pa ni nges par de yis sngon rig cing
rgyu las 'di rnams rab tu 'jug par thos nas ni
bdag med gyur pa mthong nas dam pa'i bden pa gzigs BCt_17.10

sbom po'i nyon mongs tshogs kyi rnam par nyams pa ni
grangs can lus la cha shas dang bcas mthong ba ste
sbom po dang ni phra mo de yi nyams pa ni
sangs rgyas pa yi bstan las 'gyur zhes snyam par gyur BCt_17.11

bdag tu 'du shes skyes pa nye bar mkhyud nas ni
ngar 'dzin spong ba ma yin de nas nga yi nyid
sgron ma dang ni nyin mor byed pa yod pa na
'od kyi rnam par nyams par gtan tshigs shes bya ci BCt_17.12

ji ltar padma'i chu ba che bar gyur pa yi
snal ma phra mo nyid ni gzhan dang 'brel ba ste
gap: 11 syllables
gap: 11 syllables BCt_17.13

gap: 11 syllables
gap: 11 syllables
thar pa'i cho ga thar thug min par de snyam zhing
sangs rgyas pa yis rdo ba phye dang mnyam par rtogs BCt_17.14

de nas Q, p. 76bbram zes rta dul de la mngon mchod nas
tshim zhing rang nyid kyis ni khang par rnam song zhing
bsod snyoms rim bzhin rta thul gyis kyang rab thob nas
rang bzhin gnas shing mkhas pa 'od ma'i tshal du ni BCt_17.15

de bzhin rab tu dad pas mchog dang ldan pa yi
nye rgyal kyang ni mngon du zhugs pa mthong nas ni
thos pa dang ni bsam pas bya ba mnyam pa yi
maudgala rigs su rab tu skyes pas smras pa'o BCt_17.16

dge slong de nyid gang gis gzhan bzhin gyur pa ste
brtan yin yang dag dga' zhing nye bar song
khyod kyis 'chi med ci zhig de ring thob pa ste
bzhin ni rab tu dad 'di gtan tshig med ma yin BCt_17.17

de nas 'di ltar bgyis shes 'di la des bden smras
de nas nges ni bdag la smos pa shes des smras
de nas tshig de nyid ni de yis smras pa ste
thos nas nyid kyi yang dag mig ni skyes par gyur BCt_17.18

las dang bsam pa rnam dag blo ldan de gnyis ni
lag gnas sgron ma bzhin du de nyid mthong ba ste
shes pas ston la rnam par g.yo min bsam ldan dag
de ni blta ba'i don du da lta nyid du gshegs BCt_17.19

slob D, p. 63bma'i sde bcas de nyid rgyang ma nas gzigs nas
bcom ldan drang srong chen pos dge slong rnams la gsungs
shes rab can dang rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi gtso
kho bo'i mchog gi slob ma 'di gnyis 'dir 'ongs so BCt_17.20

sde (W) ] sder (D)
nyid (W) ] gnyis (D)

de nas zab dang brtan pa'i gsung ni zhi ba yi
thub pas de gnyis la ni gtam ngag mdzad pa ste
dge slong 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'ongs rab zhi'i phyir
chos 'di ji lta ba bzhin yang dag thob par gyis BCt_17.21

smyu gu gsum lag gtsug phud dang ldan gnyis skyes de
gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs te
sangs rgyas mthu yis ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa yi
dge slong nyid du skad cig Q, p. 77agis ni gyur pa'o BCt_17.22

slob ma'i sder bcas cha lugs de yis de gnyis kyis
mgo bo dag gis thams cad mkhyen la mchod pa ste
de nas sangs rgyas kyis chos de gnyis la gsungs shing
dus kyis de gnyis kyis ni nges legs thob par gyur BCt_17.23

de nas 'od srungs rigs kyi sgron ma gnyis skyes ni
kha dog dang ni gzugs dang nor dang nyer ldan pas
rdzu 'phrul dang ni bdag ldan bzang mo rnam spangs nas
thar pa'i ched du ngur smrig bzung zhing gshegs pa'o BCt_17.24

mdog bzang gser gi mchod rten dang mtshungs 'bar ba ni
bu mang ming bcas mchod rten du ni des mthong nas
dngos po thams cad spangs shing ya mtshan dang bcas pas
thams cad mkhyen la thal mo rab sbyar mngon par song BCt_17.25

thub pa la ni rgyang nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing
phyag 'tshal nas ni ji lta ba bzhin mthon por gsol
bdag ni slob ma bcom ldan bdag gi ston pa lags
mun pa rnams su brtan pa bdag gi sgron mar gyur BCt_17.26

gnyis skyes skom pa skyes shing nye bar 'ongs par ni
mkhyen nas bsam pa rnam dag thar 'dod de la ni
sems la gsung gi chab kyis rab tu tshim mdzad pa
de bzhin gshegs pas legs par 'ongs zhes bka' stsal to BCt_17.27

gsung 'di yis ni ngal ba rnam par sos bzhin te
nges par legs par rtogs pa'i ched du gnas pa ste
de nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'di la thugs rje can
thub pas chos ni mdor bsdus pa yis gsungs pa'o BCt_17.28

gang phyir thub D, p. 64apas chos ni phra mor gsungs tsam na
de yis don ni mtha' dag yang dag thob gyur te
de phyir yang dag rig dang na tshod che nyid las
dgra bcom 'od srungs chen po nyid du mtshan gyur to BCt_17.29

gang gis lus las gzhan dang yang na lus su ni
bdag dang bdag grib zhes bdag tu rtogs pa ste
de yis bdag tu lta ba de ni nges spangs shing
nyi tshe ba min sdug bsngal 'di ni mthong Q, p. 77bbar gyur BCt_17.30

tshul khrims brtul zhugs dag gis dag par byed cing gang
rgyu med pa dang rgyu la de yis rtogs pa ste
sdug bsngal nyid dang lam ni yang dag thob nas de
tshul khrims dang ni brtul zhugs mchog tu ma bzung ngo BCt_17.31

phyin ci log tu gyur par song ba gang gi ni
mngon du bskor zhing mchog ni rab tu thob ma yin
bden pa bzhi po'i go 'phang rnams ni mthong gyur nas
the tshom som nyir gyur de yang dag chod par gyur BCt_17.32

'dod pa gang rnams su ni yang dag brgyal nyid dang
brgyal bar gyur dang brgyal bar 'gyur nyid 'jig rten pa
mi gtsang bden pa ma yin de rnams des shes nas
'dod chags shes bya'i yul de spangs par gyur pa'o BCt_17.33

de bzhin du ni byams par gyur pa'i sems kyis des
bshes dang bshes min rnams su khyad par med pa ste
'byung po kun la rjes su brtse ba byas pa yis
nang du song ba'i gnod sems yang thar gyur pa'o BCt_17.34

gzugs la brten rnams dang grong khyer brten pa rnams
sna tshogs nyid dang ldan pa'i 'du shes rnams spangs nas
des ni gzugs kyi khams su chags pa rnams bcom ste
gzugs la 'jug pa'i nyes pa rnams ni rtogs nas so BCt_17.35

rmongs las snyoms 'jug rnams su thar pa'i 'du shes dang
gzugs med lha rnams 'dzad pa can du rtogs nas ni
zhi zhing mtshan ma med pa'i sems ni bzung nas su
gzugs med srid pa la ni chags dang bral bar song BCt_17.36

chu bo sindhu'i shugs chen rab tu 'jug pa bzhin
sems kyi g.yo zhing bskyod par byed pa shes nas ni
brtan pa'i rten las rgod pa rnam par spangs pa ste
zhi zhing rdzing bu gang ba bzhin du gnas par gyur BCt_17.37

snying po med pa'i phyir 'grong ba'i chos nyid phyir
bdag med nyid phyir dngos rnams yang dag rab mthong nas
D, p. 64bkhyad 'phags nyid dang mnyam dang mchog nyid mthong ba ste
nga rgyal rnam par spangs nas yod ma yin zhes rtogs BCt_17.38

ye shes me Q, p. 78ayis mi shes mun pa rnam bcom nas
zad pa can dang zad pa med par sna tshogs mthong
rnal 'byor gyis ni rig pa nyid ni yongs bsgoms nas
ma rig pa ni mtha' dag ji lta ba bzhin spangs BCt_17.39

mthong dang bsgom pa dag gis kun tu sbyor ba ni
bcu po 'di dag rnams kyis rnam par grol gyur cing
thal mo sbyar bas sangs rgyas nyid la lta bzhin du
bya ba kun byas rang bzhin gnas te gnas par gyur BCt_17.40

skar ma gsum gyi gnas skabs gsum skyong rjes skyes lha dang ni
ldan pa'i lnga gsum tshes kyi dus su skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin
gsum ni chud zos gyur cing gsum ni lhag par thob pa yi
gsum rig slob ma gsum gyis bde bar gshegs pa rnam par mdzes BCt_17.41

| sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags G, p. 91achen po las | nyan thos chen po rab tu 1a gshegs par mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ||

de nas 'ga' zhig tshe na nor ldan khyim bdag ni
skal ba med pa rnams la nor ni rab sbyin pa
bzang sbyin zhes ni rab tu grgas pa'i min ldan pa
byang phyogs yul ko sa la rnams nas der song gyur BCt_18.1

de yis der ni thub pa bzhugs pa thos pa ste
thos nas blta bar 'dod pas mtshan po rab tu song
rnam dag sems pa des ni rab sleb rab mkhyen nas
rab tu phyag byas pa la bde bar gshegs pas bstan BCt_18.2

gang phyir chos labsgoms pas nyid ni rnam spangs nas
blo ldan mtshan mor bdag la lta 'dod rab sleb ste
da lta nyid du 'ongs C, p. 71bpa de yi de ma thag
nges par legs pa'i mgron 'di rab tu long mdzod cig BCt_18.3

gang zhig khyod kyis ltag bsam gang zhig bstan pa dang
bdag gis grags pa nyid las gang zhig dang ba dang
gang zhig sdon gyi rgyu las blo gros rab zhugs te
des ni yon tan chen po rnams kyi snod yin no BCt_18.4

de phyir 'jig rten dag na grags Q, p. 78bdang gzhan du ni
'bras bu sbyin pa mchog las byung bar rig nas ni
bkur sti byas nas dus su snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis
chos las thob pa'i nor ni sbyin par bya ba'o BCt_18.5

tshul khrims yang dag D, p. 65ablangs nas spyad par bya ba ste
tshul khrims nyid ni bsrung ba dang ni rgyan yin zhing
'og G, p. 91btu song ba rnams kyi rnam par ldog byed do
nam mkha'i steng gi nges par rdzogs pa po nyid yin BCt_18.6

'dod pa rnams su gcig min zhes pas rjes bcings pa'i
yongs su tshol ba la sogs skyon rnams thos nas ni
nges par 'byung ba'i cho gar yon tan rnam shes nas
rnam dben la skyes shi ba'i bden pa bsnyen par mdzod BCt_18.7

'chi bas nye bar gzir zhing rga bas zil non pa'i
'jig rten rab tu bskor ba yang dag yongs shes nas
zhi ba skye ba med phyir 'bad pa mdzod cig dang
skye ba bden pa med na rga med 'chi ba med BCt_18.8

ji ltar mi rnams la ni mi rtag bdag nyid kyis
rab chags sdug bsngal mngon sum du ni rig mdzod la
de bzhin lha rnams la yang sdug bsngal rig mdzod dang
'jug pa rtag pa nyid ni su yang yod ma yin BCt_18.9

gang du mi rtag pa nyid der ni sdug bsngal zhing
gang du rang nyid med pa der yang sdug bsngal te
gang du bdag ces pa dang bdag gi ba zhes pa
de tshe mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med gang la yin BCt_18.10

de phyir sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal 'di dang ni
mtshan ma las ni 'di yi mtshan ma ltos mdzod la
